Bash(python -c "from playwright.sync_api import sync_playwright; p = sync_playwright\(\).start\(\); b = p.chromium.launch\(headless=True\); page = b.new_page\(\); page.goto\(''https://www.baidu.com''\); print\(''Title:'', page.title\(\)\); b.close\(\); p.stop\(\)")
